attributes.action: To manage this country better, put british people and culture first and ensure this government acts in a professional manner when conducting their business, if not step down and save face
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As British asian(punjabi) this government needs to wake up and get its backside in to gear, why?
I ask all Brits to sign this petition for the following reasons:
1. Our boarders are not being managed.
2.Our forces in various engaugements are not being provided with the right tools for the job.
3.The British way of life more so English is under attack from so called multi-cultural experts. 
4. This Government has justified the BNP'S place in our country with its weak management of our boarders.
5. This Government does not respect our money, look at the NHS AND DEFENCE.
When things go wrong they just hike taxes and throw more money at it. Get to the root cause!!!!
6. This goverment needs to understand project management in order to deliver decent services to us.
Britain, from the dark ages has always been a mixed nation of various blood lines, we don't need jumped-up multi-cultural gurus.
Pardon my spelling.
Signing this petition is also a vote of no confidence in this government.
I hope you will support this petition.
God bless our Queen.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
